Reviews.Title: rechargeable battery
Reviews.Author: megan
Reviews.Content: The camera came with everything it said it came with but the rechargeable batteries do not hold a charge.After charging them until the light said it was charged the batteries lasted about 5 minutes. When I plugged the batteries in to recharge the charger said there was no charge and yet after charging about 15  minutes it said the batteries were charged. Again after couple of minutes of use the batteries died. I am going to get new rechargeable batteries and see if the batteries the camera came with are bad or maybe the charger is bad.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!!
Reviews.Author: S. Belke
Reviews.Content: Everything was brand new and in original packaging!  It came with everything pictured.  The camera, case, batteries, battery charger, cleaning kit, tripod, memory card, & memory card flashdrive.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: ordered off of Amazon, came from Beach Camera, love the product, camera is great!!Comes with regular batteries as well as with rechargeable.  Was a great deal...also came witha case, cleaners, tripod.  This was a bundle, and the same camera sells at the same price, justfor the camera.  I couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: This is a great camera.
Reviews.Author: gin cam
Reviews.Content: My Brother-In-Law told me about this camera. It comes with all kinds of gadgets. It takes regular batteries which makes it easier since there isn't always time to recharge a camera battery. I lost the battery on my old camera and couldn't replace it with the same kind. I had to buy a generic one and it did not work all of the time. It was expensive to replace the camera battery so I was disappointed. I love the zoom and the clarity of the pictures!!!

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot SX160 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 16x Wide-Angle
Reviews.Author: machinist
Reviews.Content: I really lke the camera. It's fantastic but for a senior person the settings are complicated. My son is computer literate and he helped me go through that part of using the camera otherwise I would be lost. It's very well built because the case is heavy and isn't as flimsy as some new cameras. I like the wheel adjustment at the top of the camera rather than on screen touch settings on newer cameras. It's one of the last few cameras that has that adjustment. To me as an elderly person it is easier to use than going into the camera and adjusting the picture settings every time you want to take a picture when the lighting is different. The big screen on the back to view the picture is also great. The pictures come out sharp and clear because of the large amount of megapixels the camera has. I would definitely recommend this camera to others because of the previous features I spoke about.The price was very reasonable for the quality of a point and shoot camera. You will have to buy a bigger camera purse for the camera as the one that comes with it is way too small.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Holly O'Connell
Reviews.Content: Camera works great!Pictures turn out good!Battery has not died yet either, so the life must be pretty good as well.

Reviews.Title: canon powershot
Reviews.Author: Sally Truax
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a Christmas gift for our daughter.  She loves it!  It is more compact which makes it easier for her to take along everywhere!

Reviews.Title: Great choise for the price ;)
Reviews.Author: Ambasadori
Reviews.Content: I like the price and the quality of pictures that you can take.You can have clear quality pictures on 16 MP.The only think that i don't like is that comes with double battery:(.There is no litium battery for this item.You have to keep extra batteries when you go out;)

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Jenkins
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Lightweight, small and takes good pics. Good choice for me an amateur photographer. I would recommend this product to a friend

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: JF
Reviews.Content: Off to Japan for a year or so, nice and compact, easy to carry, good pics, OK? I have trouble coming up with enough words

Reviews.Title: decent camera
Reviews.Author: Sandra Riker
Reviews.Content: It is very sensitive to movement and does not capture everything you want in the picture.  Overall it is a nice camera.

Reviews.Title: more than expected
Reviews.Author: Donald Cousineau
Reviews.Content: again canon made another great low end camera.This camera does more than expected.pictures are great.battery life is great,the  extras that came with this camera as just  a bonus.

Reviews.Title: Amazing for the price
Reviews.Author: Woody1
Reviews.Content: Got the camera and an assortment of goodies to go with it for a low price. I love the camera so far. Some mentioned it felt a bit cheaply made but it seems solid and sturdy to me.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. Great for the first time user. Had a photographer show me all the tricks of using this camera to its full potential.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures, slow flash
Reviews.Author: Robin L Zehnder
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera package. Pictures are outstanding. The flash is a little frustrating as it takes forever to charge. I use tis camera on projects mostly during the day, so the flash is something I can usally work around.

Reviews.Title: Great economical camera
Reviews.Author: Beverly M. Woodham
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip and it met all of my needs and expectations.  It's small, easy to handle and takes excellent pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Timothy Good
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Takes great pictures. Uses AA batteries instead of expensive hard to get battery pack. Awsome camera for everyday use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent starter camera
Reviews.Author: Chris "Photo Expressions"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 12 year old grandson for his birthday.  I started him with a point and shoot when he was 3 years old.  He does an excellent job of photographing and he loved using this camera.  He has had fun with the video portion as well.  It was a good investment for his more advanced version from his point and shoot and a good foundation before the next level.  He liked getting all of the accessories as well.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: APAT
Reviews.Content: very good camera for the price and easy to use. I would recommend using lithium ion batteries (2xAA) with this camera.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: jessica
Reviews.Content: It worked great I enjoyed using this Canon at an event and it worked out well. the only thing I would change would be the battery part because it died but the product came with rechargeable ones thanks!

Reviews.Title: Easy Easy Easy
Reviews.Author: goalie
Reviews.Content: For a camera novice, this is a very easy camera to use.  it provides wonderful pictures with very little effort.  Just what someone like me needs. Just took a nice vacation and got lots of pictures that have turned out wonderfully.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: babiez5
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. I have 5 kids, so i am takin alot of pictures. Great picture quality and storage.  Will be buyin another one soon!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for an aging amateur!
Reviews.Author: Leonard King
Reviews.Content: Have had dozens of camera's..At 73 years I have trouble keeping up with all the electronic advances in everything. We recently had our 1st Grandchild and I needed a more efficient, easy to use than the four older camera's we have..This camera fit all my requirements..It was reccomended by a friend in Florida who has a earlier version..Very happy with it and seldom leave home with out it..LKJ Moosup, CT.

Reviews.Title: I encantaa
Reviews.Author: Jossibell
Reviews.Content: excellent product fulfills its purpose, service quality, timely and efficient. 100% reliable in addition to recommended by your quality and attention

Reviews.Title: It is a great combo.
Reviews.Author: Pancho
Reviews.Content: All you need it is in this combo. You don't need anything else to buy to start to enjoy your camera. I use for a big trip foreign without any problem.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures and great price
Reviews.Author: D. Miller
Reviews.Content: This camera is an awesome piece of equipment which I gave to my husband for a recent birthday. He is an avid mountain biker and loves taking pics while riding or hanging with family on vacation. The lens has 12 megapixels which gives it great clarity and color. It is easy to use with an amazing zoom lens.Perfect for the recreational user, but more than a first time camera.I did a lot of research and this was by far the best result. I had read reviews about poor battery life, but we have not encountered that problem.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Gweedo Murray
Reviews.Content: Reviewed this already but will reiterate, that although I was most pleased with the features was disappointed with the image quality and was compelled to return it.

Reviews.Title: Problem with rechargeable batteries
Reviews.Author: Andrea S.
Reviews.Content: Only problem was with the batteries that came with the charger. Batteries never got full charged, even after a whole night charging and it would last  very little. I had to switch off after taking pictures to try to save energy. Otherwise a very good bundle and good quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: powershot sx160
Reviews.Author: K.
Reviews.Content: we like it, arrived on time.takes great pics,as some have reviewed rechargeable batteries that come with it are not good.beginning to wonder if flaw with camera because turn off and immediately back on and battery warning is gone.Have read about a firm ware update from canon,but have yet to try.

Reviews.Title: amazing camera
Reviews.Author: Chris-boom
Reviews.Content: my wifes nikon broke and it was time for an upgrade. canon. this camera was perfect. not bulky and nice form and function, great zoom and amazing detail. and an amazing price ratio for what you get.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Oswaldo Romero "OART44"
Reviews.Content: me gusto el producto, lo que  mostro la foto, sin problema en la entrega,  compra satisfactoria producto en buena calidad

ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX160 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 16x Wide-Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3.0-Inch LCD (Black) Premiere Bundle With 16 GB Secure Digital High Capacity (SDHC) Memory Card, Digpro Compact Camera Deluxe Carrying Case
